description:
----Introductory Price ONLY - Increasing to $30Â Soon---

----Updated for April 2016---

Are you a busy person, who still loves to live healthy? Living healthy takes time and I know it is EXTREMELY time consuming! - You have to do groceries, prepare all these raw products into something tasty, look for recipes, follow preparation steps, cook and then you can eat.

Guarantee: By the end of this course you'll be able to make smoothies which are ready within 5 minutes. You can live healthy without taking hours to prepare something nice.

That's why we created SIMPLE SMOOTHOLOGY!

Simple Smoothology is a complete course for you on how to make smoothies! Besides that Simple Smoothology contains 10 incredibely good and delicious recipes for every situation! With these STEP BY STEP instructional video's there is ABSOLUTELY NO WAY you can go wrong.

We will also include an interactive ebook with all the recipes written down for you. Simple Smoothology contains the 10 smoothie recipes you'll ever need to know.

Simple Smoothology is taught by Virgina, an incredible smoothie expert, who is going to teach AMAZING tips on making smoothies, what type of blender to use, how to never waste money on rotten vegetables anymore, but above all.. the 10 incredible Simple Smoothology recipes which are:

  1. Digestive Smoothie
  2. Hangover Smoothie (Green Smoothie!)
  3. Tan Booster
  4. Fat Burner (Green Smoothie!)
  5. Detox Smoothie (Green Smoothie!)
  6. Tropical Smoothie
  7. Berrylicious Smoothie
  8. Sweet Milkshake Smoothie
  9. Coffee Lovers
  10. Weight Loss Smoothie (Green Smoothie!)

We are also including the following bonusses, only if you order your copy of Simple Smoothology TODAY!

  • Video on how to make any kind of nut milk (valued at: $17)
  • Infographic on how to make any type of smoothie combination taste incredible (valued at: $12)
  • Ebook on how to make any kind of nut milk (valuted at: $17)
  • Access to the Secret Simple Smoothology Facebook Group (valued at: $47)
  • That's $93 dollars worth of value for FREE only if you order NOW!
    • Stop procrastinating, eating pizza's and living unhealthy. Start living healthy today!

    Order your copy of Simple Smoothology today by clicking the button to your right!
title: Simple Smoothie - 10 Smoothies - With Green Smoothie Recipes
